comment.body: I hope that #Assad takes back the #Golan heights and the rest of his country from the #thieving, #murdering, #racist #apartheid #Israeli regime.

#Russian intelligence has been saying for weeks that the #US and #Israeli backed white helmet terrorist are planing another false flag gas attack to blame on #Assad. As another excuse to attack Syria. They are all lying, and it will backfire on them with a vengeance.

@Mappedmind: The gas attacks were done by the white helmet #Israeli and #US western back rebel #terrorist in #Syria. #Assad has absolutely nothing to gain from a gas attack. He publicly destroyed all his chemical weapons. Assad and Syria are kicking rebel terrorist and invader #Ass. Personally I think limited chemical and biologic weapons are an acceptable defensive deterrents and options against foreign invaders. But not on your own people the way Israel gases #Palestinians in their own country of historic #Palestine! :-)
